评论详情: I get overwhelmed with the endless amounts of workout leggings online and never ended up getting new ones. Although for my holiday trip, I decided I must at least get one and thought Amazon should come in handy. After a bit of research I stumbled upon this product and based on its high ratings/reviews, I decided to give it a shot. I ordered the periwinkle blue to match with a sports bra I already owned. I didn’t realize how buttery soft these leggings were and am absolutely head over heels about them. They felt super comfortable on the skin with plenty of stretch. I was a bit nervous ordering XS (which is my normal size) but one never knows how a size chart flows and especially ordering on Amazon, but it worked out perfectly. All in all, I’d recommend these.
So soft and flattering!

评论概述: Get a size up they run small!
评论详情: They aren’t see through I’m so happy it is so hard to find non see though leggings, very stretchy, pretty durable and good quality. Comfy overall I got a xs (110lbs/5’5) definitely get a size up!
So comfy! Wore them all day to a game
I didn’t notice there were no pockets on these pants, but other than that, they fit well and feel good
One of the BEST a mazon purchases I've AEVER made!! Super cute fits perfectly soft comfy material looks designer!!
These are sooo comfortable and the material is smooth like butter!!

I love the soft material and thickness of these leggings. Super comfortable when working out and flattering. The "V" shape in the back is complimenting. The color is super nice and versatile. The fit is great, I am short and they are too long on me so I need to fold them at the bottom but it still looks great.

I live in a hot climate, so I don't like really heavy compression leggings. These however, take "light" to a different level, as they're more like a pair of ankle length underwear. I like leggings that breathe, but that also lend some shape and contour. Sadly, these missed every mark for me, and I was the second person to return them. I only know that as they came repackaged in a baggie with no labels or tags.

评论概述: Soft and great fit, no pockets
评论详情: Since I basically live in leggings, I am always scrolling in search of the next pair and I landed on the YITTY yoga pants/leggings. These are terrific! They move well and are super comfortable, whether I’m actually working out or they are just the pants I put on.  The fit is true to size. I got these as the holiday season ramped up (Halloween!), so I ordered a large rather than a medium and they fit very well, without any pinching at the waistband. The high-rise design stays in place throughout workouts and daily wear—there’s no constant need to pull them up or adjust them. The fabric is soft yet durable, with a slightly slick finish. The material provides decent compression, so I get a smooth look without feeling suffocating or revealing every ripple.  These leggings have a clean, sleek design with minimal branding, which I like for versatility. The lack of pockets is my main complaint—while I don’t always need them, they are useful for holding my phone when walking or working out. They wash well and haven’t shown any signs of pilling or fading after multiple trips through the washer and dryer.  I’m really happy with these leggings. They fit, are soft, and look great.

评论概述: Comfortable, Medium Thickness, Fit Well- No Sag
评论详情: I like these tights a lot.  They’re very comfortable, and a nice medium thickness.  I especially like the fit…no sagging.  The only thing I don’t care for…and this is a personal preference thing…is the yoga waist.  With mine, there is some wrinkling at the V in front.  I much prefer a regular waistband.Defined recommended, especially if you like the yoga waist style.

For the price point. I really do like these leggings. They are stretchy and flattering, especially on your backside. I do feel like the fabric could be a little more compressive in the stomach area in comparison to other leggings I own.. I ordered true to size with a medium, but could have probably sized down even to a small.
These remind me of the under armour brand they are a pretty burgundy color and run true to size
I love these workout pants. Good stretch. Very absorbent so I don’t feel wet and sweaty when I work out in them.

评论概述: So Soft & Fit like a Dream!!
评论详情: The Ultraluxe Crossover High-Waisted Leggings in deep navy are an absolute game-changer! From the moment I put them on, I was impressed by how buttery-soft and luxurious the fabric feels—it’s lightweight yet supportive, and so comfortable I almost forget I’m wearing them.  The crossover high-waisted design is incredibly flattering, giving a sleek, sculpted look while staying securely in place during workouts or casual wear. The 7/8 length is perfect—it hits just above the ankle, making it ideal for a polished look with sneakers or sandals.  The deep navy color is stunning and versatile, easily pairing with anything in my wardrobe. These leggings have quickly become my favorite for yoga, errands, or lounging. They wash well without fading or losing their shape, which is a big plus.  Definitely recommend!!
These leggings are super comfy and good material. They fit well and stay stretchy all day.
comfy but not super thick not see through stretch! took forever to arrive! pass the squat test

Love these pants. They fit perfectly. However; I did not receive the ‘V’ waist. Mine just has a normal waist. Almost deducted a star for that, but I like the pants enough that I didn’t. I’m 5’6”, about 150, 27/28 in jeans, 40-inch hips, and an hourglass.
Fit good and very comfortable. Not see through.

The Yitty Active Women's Ultraluxe High-Waist Legging offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, and performance. The 7/8 length and high-waisted design provide a flattering fit while offering support and flexibility. Made from a 4-way stretch fabric, these leggings move with you, making them ideal for both intense workouts and casual wear. The ultraluxe material is soft and breathable, ensuring all-day comfort. Whether you're at the gym or running errands, these leggings provide the perfect combination of function and fashion, making them a great addition to any active wardrobe.
Fits nicely and doesn’t ride up in the front Really helps to show my gains, I am beyond thrilled with these pants!

评论概述: I did not expect this fabric.
评论详情: I didn’t expect that it was some form of a synthetic fabric and I love it. It’s unlike some that starts to build lint balls after you where them a certain amount of time. it has pocket so you cannot go wrong. It is high waisted and just works for anything. I can go to the gym, run errands and it fits with almost any top. I use it when traveling because it’s super comfortable

My biggest issue with these leggings is the waistband. The back of the waistband has a elastic running across the top, which cuts into your back fat, because the front waistband is seamless and smooth which creates an asymmetrical tugging feeling

These leggings are GREAT! The are very well-made with durable fabrics! They fit amazingly and are SUPER comfortable! I love them!!  My only complaint, is that there are no pockets!  I highly recommend these leggings!
These are so soft and I like the high cross waist. They stay in place! I wish they were a little more snug at the ankle but overall love them. They fit true to size.
Soft. No show. Nice and thick. Smoothing. Great fabric well made.

These leggings are so comfortable and soft. I don’t have another pair of leggings that feel this soft on my skin. They are sturdy enough where they pass the bend test and actually stay up during activity. They have a unique seam in that the seam in the back is different than the front which I think helps them stay in place. I have worn them during both yoga and running and they are fantastic for both.
These have 2 layers of fabric in front that cross over each other at an angle so they’re different than your typical leggings. At the same time, they are soft and form fitting.

Strong crossover waist band and plenty of stretch in this comfortable fabric make these favs on my gal. The fit is right and they stay cool and dry with their wicking ability. She loves these compared to other brands she owns. Good deal.
I really like these workout leggings. They are smooth and comfortable. They aren’t see through and I think they are flattering.

Understanding that yoga pants pants run small, while my pant size is 14 Petite, I ordered these in an XL. The material is nice for exercising. The green is a really pretty green BUT , they are clingy and just fit in a size XL. If you are normally a size 16 or up these will be a struggle to put in. They will also be short.  If you are a smaller size 0-12 you will enjoy them, just size up.

I’m in love with these leggings. This is the first time I’ve wore this brand. They are so comfortable and it soft I wore them to the gym and I just feel so comfortable. I would definitely order this brand again.
Super soft and comfortable. Nice breathable material. Fits true to size and has good amount of stretch.
